name: Space Warp
overview: You are Vaga, captain of a "Watchdog" battle cruiser patrolling the fifth quadrant. Suddenly blue lights flashing - engine trouble - the ship is running amok almost reaching warp speed. The crazy flight takes it into a vast meteor field, Vaga takes the helm using his alert reflexes to avoid the oncoming bombardment. Nearby are evil Zeeton "Hunterships" monitoring Vaga's predicament Normally they wouldn't attempt an attack on a "Watchdog" with its lethal dual plasma cannons, now the Zeetons decide to attack. Vaga readies himself for the strike, knowing full well the capability of the "Huntership", its unique way of diving then suddenly splitting into two, one ship a neutron bomber the other a laser fighter. Can Vaga repel the attack? Mind the meteors!
